thread.title_full: CITIGROUP INC Files SEC form 8-K, Financial Statements and Exhibits

title: CITIGROUP INC Files SEC form 8-K, Financial Statements and Exhibits
text:
Show all filings for CITIGROUP INC 
Form 8-K for CITIGROUP INC 
7-Aug-2015 Item 9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. 
(d) Exhibits: 
Exhibit No. Description 1.01 Terms Agreement, dated July 28, 2015, among Citigroup Inc. (the "Company") and the underwriters named therein, relating to the offer and sale of the Company's Floating Rate Notes due August 7, 2019. 4.01 Form of DTC Note for the Company's Floating Rate Notes due August 7, 2019. 4.02 Form of International Note for the Company's Floating Rate Notes due August 7, 2019. 4.03 Agency Agreement, dated August 7, 2015, between the Company and Citibank, N.A. 5.01 Opinion of Barbara Politi, Esq.
